Text: Good Quality. The restoration looks and sounds great! I had forgotten how much I like this movie. It's a musical with romance, but it's also really funny in a mean/sarcastic way. Thanks for uploading!
I'm sorry for a stupid question, but is it black-and-white or colour film?
Thank you so much for uploading this classic.
Answer to stupid question: MFL is in colour (as you might have found out if you'd taken the trouble to check on IMDB)
